# A plugin to intergrate bfnplatform components to ONL.
#
# Putting below files here, they will be installed by install-bfnpltform-pkgs.sh during ONL build time.
# Or modify install-bfnplatform-pkgs.sh to add or delete customized components if reuqired.
# Comment all entries in install-bfnplatform-pkgs.sh will disable the intergration.
#
